title: Here are the OPPO phones scheduled to receive ColorOS 12 in March 2022
content:
Last month OPPO opened up the ColorOS 12 beta program for a bunch of new devices, including the OPPO F19 Pro, OPPO F17 Pro, and Reno 4. Now OPPO has detailed the next batch of phones scheduled to receive ColorOS 12 in March 2022. OPPO plans to extend the latest version of its custom skin

The post Here are the OPPO phones scheduled to receive ColorOS 12 in March 2022 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OPPO has detailed the next batch of phones scheduled to receive ColorOS 12 in March 2022. Check out the full list.
